192.sentence: I had never liked the idea of the Diaper Genie because of the refills.

194.sentence: We use regular kitchen sized garbage bags.

195.sentence: We've never experienced odor from the pail.

196.sentence: It was easy to assemble, and the diapers fit perfectly into the little nook before they make their way into the pail portion.

197.sentence: It was easy to assemble, and the diapers fit perfectly into the little nook before they make their way into the pail portion.

198.sentence: I also love that you can flip the device with one hand...

200.sentence: I am soooo pleased with this product!!!

201.sentence: A wise investment for the pocketbook & for the nose!!!

203.sentence: So I can't tell you if Diaper Champ will be as good at containing the formula generated poop smell, but it's excellent at containing the smell of poop of my breastfed baby!

204.sentence: Friends told me that the Diaper Genie did not work very well, so bought the Diaper Champ based on on-line reviews and I have been happy with it.

205.sentence: It works easily with one hand, which is important.

206.sentence: Also, it takes any kitchen sized trash bag, so there is no special bag to stock.

207.sentence: While the perfect ordor free diaper pail has yet to be invented, the Diaper Champ is a good as it gets.

208.sentence: Gets stinky after a few months, the seal on the piston doesn't seal anymore.

209.sentence: Also, diapers and wipes get stuck in the grove below the piston.

210.sentence: I gave up and got a diaper Dekor.

213.sentence: I was using the cheapie pail...and it worked ok until the opening device fell apart.

214.sentence: I was using the cheapie pail...and it worked ok until the opening device fell apart.
